member.name: M:GGs.Server.Controllers.AuditController.Log(GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog)
member.summary: Ingest a tweak execution audit log. Provide X-Machine-Token header if unauthenticated and no client certificate.
member.remarks: Security: Allowed if request is authenticated OR mTLS client certificate is present OR header X-Machine-Token matches configured Audit:MachineToken.
